title: Desktop/laptop ownership among U.S. adults 2008 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories for the x axis representing Month, and a y axis representing Share of U.S. adults.
The highest category is found at November_2016 where Share of U.S. adults is 78.0.
The lowest category is found at January_2018 where Share of U.S. adults is 73.0.
gold: The statistic shows the penetration rate of desktop and laptop computers among adults in the United States between 2008 and 2019 . As of February 2019 , 74 percent of Americans owned a desktop or laptop computer .
